TEST.PARAGRAPH: This element is unstyled save for a background color of gray. However, it contains an inline element of padding-top 25px and background-color of red, giving it a red background and a 25px top padding. Padding on inline elements do not affect line-height calculations, so all lines in this element should have the same line-height. There may be implementation-specific limits on how much of the padding the user agent is able to display.
